title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 576.2 - Significant economic injury
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 576.2 - Significant economic injury

State Regulations
(a) The
applicant may seek to prove, by specific financial documentation and expert
testimony, that the strict application of the relevant restrictions will result
in significant economic injury. (b) The testimony shall be limited to the effect of the restrictions upon the value
of the property in question; whether the value would be enhanced were a
variance granted shall not be relevant. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
576.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
